data.name: Eight-Minute Empire: Starfall Crater Map
data.detailed_description:
After an ancient disaster, the Starfall Crater lay fallow for generations. Now fully recovered, the region's many natural resources are prime for exploitation.

The special rules are:

🟡 There are coins in some regions on the map. If you are the first to reach the coin, you claim it immediately. 🟡
🌍 The central continent is worth 4vp. All other continents are worth 2vp. 🌍
🗺️ This map has a few more goods regions than usual. 🗺️
🛍️ The VP for sets of goods is slightly different: 1/2/4/7 🛍️
